original_title: The Search for the Saddest Punt in the World
overview: To punt is to give up, and in the 21st century, NFL teams have given up nearly 50,000 times. Most of those punts were reasonable decisions. But a few were so cowardly, and in such defiance of all reason, that they must not be forgotten.
title: The Search for the Saddest Punt in the World
